Description.Text: Palm Island Resort is a luxurious 4-star hotel offering stylish accommodation in the heart of Palm Island. Highlights include a swimming pool and spa. Palm Island is a tiny island close to Union Island. Nearby places of interest include glorious beaches and Union Island. The hotel occupies a collection of villas overlooking the sea. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, gym, tennis court and water sports. A range of massages and spa treatments are available on request. Free wired internet is available throughout the premises. Beachfront rooms are 41sqm and decorated in a charming local style with peaked roofs and woven rattan ceilings. They feature a small sitting area and private terrace overlooking the pool or garden. Amenities include a mini-bar and safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The Royal Palm restaurant offers Caribbean specialties in a relaxed and friendly setting. The Sunset Grill restaurant offers international dishes on the beach. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
